description: This file contains C source code implementing functions that interact with the DSLh DataModelAgent for retrieving parameter values and instance numbers, primarily for a WiFi agent component. It includes external references, such as 'cosa_apis.h' and 'cosa_apis_busutil.h', and defines functions like CosaGetParamValueUlong, CosaGetParamValueString, CosaGetParamValueBool, and CosaGetInstanceNumberByIndex, which fetch parameter data or instance info via global functions.

methods.name: ULONG CosaGetParamValueUlong(char * pParamName)
methods.description: Retrieves a ULONG (unsigned long) parameter value given its full parameter name.

methods.name: int CosaGetParamValueString(char * pParamName,char * pBuffer,PULONG pulSize)
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value, storing it into a supplied buffer, and indicating success, failure, or buffer size update.

methods.name: BOOL CosaGetParamValueBool(char * pParamName)
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value given its full parameter name.

methods.name: ULONG CosaGetInstanceNumberByIndex(char * pObjName,ULONG ulIndex)
methods.description: Retrieves the instance number associated with a given object name and index.
